title: Validate email
markdownHelp: Refer to this documentation for markdown syntax:
description: A message showing some file with an optional title
reference: Reference variable in the temp memory where the result will be stored
train: Note: The Bot must be trained for this skill to work properly.
contentTitle: Select the content element to be used to request the user's e-mail address
multiple: Multiple emails, if set to true, an array of all detected emails will be assigned to the reference variable instead of a text string
